abstract: Citigroup said it would pay $1.66 billion to the Enron Bankruptcy Estate, which represented Enron creditors caught up in one of the biggest corporate scandals.
snippet: Citigroup said it would pay $1.66 billion to the Enron Bankruptcy Estate, which represented Enron creditors caught up in one of the biggest corporate scandals.
lead_paragraph: Seeking to put its legal problems behind as it confronts larger financial ones, the banking giant Citigroup said on Wednesday that it had settled claims accusing it of helping the energy trader Enron deceive investors.

headline.main: Citigroup Resolves Claims That It Helped Enron Deceive Investors
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Resolves Claims That It Helped Enron Deceive Investors
